name: lemon-squeezy
title: Lemon Squeezy
description: Orders and Products in all your Stores
author: xmok

commands.name: search-orders
commands.title: Search Orders
commands.subtitle: Lemon Squeezy
commands.description: List all orders in all your stores

commands.name: search-products
commands.title: Search Products
commands.subtitle: Lemon Squeezy
commands.description: List all products in all your stores

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
